title: S&W M&P Shield 9mm & .40 Ruger LC9 Beavertail Grip Sleeve Hogue 18400
features: Gentle palm swells fit comfortably in hand
Finger grooves naturally position fingers for optimal grip
Textured with Hogue's famous Cobblestone pattern for increased comfort and grip
Beavertail cushions the hand on recoil and offers increased hand comfort higher on the grip
Designed for a tight and secure fit engaging with the texture and contours of the firearm's frame
description: FEATURES: Gentle palm swells fit comfortably in hand Finger grooves naturally position fingers for optimal grip Textured with Hogue's famous Cobblestone pattern for increased comfort and grip Beavertail cushions the hand on recoil and offers increased hand comfort higher on the grip Made from long lasting durable thermoplastic elastomer that ages gracefully for years of service Designed for a tight and secure fit engaging with the texture and contours of the firearm's frame COMPATIBLE WITH: Beretta 85 Bersa BP9CC and Thunder 380 FNS 9C Heckler and Koch 45C Hi Point CF380 Kahr P9, P40, P45, CW9, CW40, CW45 Kel Tec PF9 Ruger SR22 Smith and Wesson M&P Shield 45 SAR Arms SAR B6P Compact SIG SAUER E2 P224 Taurus PT111 Millennium G2, PT140 Millenium, 709 Walther PPS, PK380, PPK, PPK/S THIS GRIP WILL ALSO FIT AND FUNCTION WELL ON THE FOLLOWING FIREARMS, THOUGH NOT SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED FOR A PRECISION FIT: (LARGER FRAME MODELS WILL REQUIRE STRENUOUS EFFORT TO INSTALL GRIP) Precision fit for S&W M&P Shield 9mm & .40 S&W / Ruger LC9, EC9 models

title: Does NOT WORK ON THE 2.0 MODEL
